title: Lions-Packers, Elite Quarterbacks, and the Herd Hierarchy
itunes:title: Lions-Packers, Elite Quarterbacks, and the Herd Hierarchy
description:
Colin talks about the Lions-Packers game, what he would do to fix bad officiating, the issues with QB Matt Stafford, what few quarterbacks in the NFL do very well, and his new Herd Hierarchy. Guests include Reggie Bush, Peter King, Mike Pereira, Alex Rodriguez, and Mark Schlereth.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
